caseName: United States v. McCullough

recap_documents.description: REPORT AND RECOMMENDATION as to Joshua McCullough, Jimmy Ray Whorton, Sandra Whorton, James McKenzie, Karry Autry, Holly Autry, Joseph Tillman, Brian Prewitt, Paul Bunch, Ira Butler.  As to defendant McCullough (1), the Court recommends denying the M otions to Suppress [153,154,155] and defers ruling on the Motions to Suppress [156,157,197] until the conclusion of all evidentiary hearings.As to defendant J. Whorton (2), the Court recommends denying defendant's Motion to Suppress  163 . As to  defendant S. Whorton (3), the Court recommends denying defendant's Motion to Suppress  125  and defers ruling on the Motions to Suppress [124,183] until the conclusion of all evidentiary hearings. As to defendant McKenzie (4), the Court recomme nds denying defendant's Motions to Suppress [112,294,307,308,315,316] and defers ruling on the Motion to Suppress  113  until the conclusion of all evidentiary hearings.As to defendant K. Autry (5), the Court grants defendant's Motion for J ackson Denno Hearing  224 , recommends denying defendant's Motions to Suppress [226,227,247] and defers ruling on the Motion to Suppress  125  until the conclusion of all evidentiary hearings.As to defendant H. Autry (6), the Court grants defend ant's Motion for Jackson Denno Hearing  141 , recommends denying defendant's Motions to Suppress [143,199,200,230,249] and defers ruling on the Motion to Suppress  142  until the conclusion of all evidentiary hearings.As to defendant Bunch  (9), the Court defers ruling on the Motions to Suppress [146,147,148,196,205] until the conclusion of all evidentiary hearings.As to defendant Butler (10), the Court defers ruling on the Motions to Suppress [130,213] until the conclusion of all evidentiary hearings.The Court also denies all requests for Franks hearings [125,155-156,163,205,203,249,294,308,316].  Signed by Magistrate Judge Alan J. Baverman on 8/29/11.  (ddm)
